channel.title: 1.9 Discussion
channel.description:
[ul]Yep, Notch and the team is already working on 1.9, I'm gonna keep updating this thread with whatever is planned for 1.9. Sorry if these images are a little large. So let's start this off. [img]http://i.imgur.com/OQXAR.jpg[/img]
Jeb recently revealed a new spoiler screenshot of the nether! We can clearly see some sort of nether-brick bridges spanning over the massive lava lakes so prevalent in the Nether. This definitely bodes well for Nether travel, making the trip across massive distances much safer! ...that is, if they generate everywhere! Where do they spawn? Are they a part of a larger structure elsewhere? You'll just have to wait and see!
This actually looks pretty cool to me, and I like the idea. It would make travel in the Nether far safer and easier, but then there goes the fun of the Nether. The Nether is supposed to be very dangerous, and not easy to travel through. But, I still like the idea. _____ [img]http://i.imgur.com/ADYrx.png[/img]
Notch recently tweeted about a new mob, which appears to be an assembled snowman! Further details were not released about its nature, abilities or behavior, but it seems safe to say that it would likely spawn in snow biomes.
This seems like it would be awesome, and if it does only spawn in snow biomes, then that would be good as snow biomes don't really get that much attention. (I personally try to stay away from them, because the snow that builds up on your stuff gets annoying) Anyway, yeah. More coming soon. [/size][size=36pt][b]DISCUSS.[/b][/size][size=12px] Post your ideas on 1.9, or just anything that has to do with 1.9.[/size][size=12px][/li][/ul] [/li][/list]

item.description:
@Travas wrote:

1.9 is pretty cool so far

you create Snow Golems by stacking 2 snow blocks vertically, and then place a pumpkin on top. If you have 4 of them, they can hold back a zombie :o

lol yeah the villagers are uglyyyyy.

item.title: 1.9 Discussion
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The ‘snow golem’ or ‘snowman’, both names on Notch’s twitter, throws snowballs at other mobs. As known snowballs deal 0 damage so they are very suicidal. Notch has reported that watching them go after creepers and skeletons is funny to watch lol.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.9 Discussion
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[ul]Yep, Notch and the team is already working on 1.9, I’m gonna keep updating this thread with whatever is planned for 1.9. Sorry if these images are a little large.

So let’s start this off.

OQXAR.jpg1920×1080

Jeb recently revealed a new spoiler screenshot of the nether! We can clearly see some sort of nether-brick bridges spanning over the massive lava lakes so prevalent in the Nether. This definitely bodes well for Nether travel, making the trip across massive distances much safer! ...that is, if they generate everywhere! Where do they spawn? Are they a part of a larger structure elsewhere? You'll just have to wait and see!

This actually looks pretty cool to me, and I like the idea. It would make travel in the Nether far safer and easier, but then there goes the fun of the Nether. The Nether is supposed to be very dangerous, and not easy to travel through. But, I still like the idea.

ADYrx.png854×480

Notch recently tweeted about a new mob, which appears to be an assembled snowman! Further details were not released about its nature, abilities or behavior, but it seems safe to say that it would likely spawn in snow biomes.

This seems like it would be awesome, and if it does only spawn in snow biomes, then that would be good as snow biomes don’t really get that much attention. (I personally try to stay away from them, because the snow that builds up on your stuff gets annoying)

Anyway, yeah. More coming soon.

[/size][size=36pt]DISCUSS.[/size][size=12px] Post your ideas on 1.9, or just anything that has to do with 1.9.[/size][size=12px][/li][/ul]
[/li][/list]
